news.content: Our paper "Semantic Images Segmentation for autonomous driving using Self-Attention Knowledge Distillation" has been accepted to The IEEE SITIS 2022
Our paper "No-reference Point Clouds Quality Assessment using Transformer and Visual Saliency" has been accepted to The QoEVMA/ACMM 2022
Our paper "Blind projection-based 3D point cloud quality assessment method using a convolutional neural network" has been accepted to The VISAPP 2022
Our paper "A Multi-task convolutional neural network for blind stereoscopic image quality assessment using naturalness analysis" has been accepted to The ICIP 2021
Salima Bourbia starts a PhD thesis, working on quality assessment of 3D point cloud
Kacem Ichakdi starts a PhD thesis, working on 3D point cloud segmentation using deep learning
<a href="docs/SujetCotutelle_ISENYncreaOuest.pdf" target="_blank">Phd position on 3D point cloud segmentation (position filled)
New journal paper accepted in Computers & Electrical Engineering on Multivariate Copula Statistical Model and Weighted Sparse Classification for Radar Image Target Recognition
Simohamed Hdafa starts a PhD thesis, working on image captionning using deep learning
New position : Associate Professor at <a href="https: //isen-nantes.fr/">ISEN Yncr√©a Ouest/Nantes Campus, France
I successfully defended my PhD thesis !
